TITLE: Episode 18 - Grow Families, Not Government
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie discuss a spicy meme that got a lot of heat... from a guy that believes the myth of overpopulation. Apparently we’ll really live in paradise when there are less of us! This and other Malthusian and Ehrlich-inspired insanity discussed this week.
